name: Gluttony
description:
Gluttony

Game Created for Ludum Dare 46

You can rate the game here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/gluttony

Use arrows or A,D to move.

Be careful with the mushrooms and spikes. The mushrooms can also be killed by spikes. The right way is not necessary right before you.

Your hunger is killing you, to survive you need to find food.

Try to find the hidden Golden Onigiri to win the game.
